it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.server

Class ServerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.server.ServerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RemoteServer, SocketServer, Runnable, Remote

    public class ServerImpl
extends Object
implements SocketServer, RemoteServer, Runnable
    A class representing the implementation of a server it implements both the server and remote server interfaces This class uses the singleton pattern
    Author:
    Alessandro Fulgini

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ServerImpl getInstance()
        Returns the instance of the server
        Returns:
        The instance of the server

      • run

        public void run()
        Runs the server, after it has been created and properly set up. The server starts listening for both RMI and Socket connections
        Specified by:
        run in interface Runnable

      • playerLogin

        public void playerLogin(String username,
                        RemoteView view)
                 throws LoginException
        Description copied from interface: SocketServer
        Request to log in a user. The client tries to log in with the required username and also passes a stub of his view. The cases are:
        1. The player is completely unknown to the server => he will be put in the waiting room
        2. The player belongs to an active/suspended match => he will join the match
        3. There is a logged in player with the same username => the request will be rejected with LoginException
        Specified by:
        playerLogin in interface RemoteServer
        Specified by:
        playerLogin in interface SocketServer
        Parameters:
        username - name of the player who wants to get logged in
        view - stub of the view exported on the RMI registry
        Throws:
        LoginException - if the username is associated to an already logged in player

      • playerLogout

        public void playerLogout(String username)
        Request to log out a user. If the user is logged in, it gets logged out and all operations to suspend him are taken care of. If it is not logged in, nothing happens.
        Specified by:
        playerLogout in interface RemoteServer
        Specified by:
        playerLogout in interface SocketServer
        Parameters:
        username - name of the player to be logged out

      • unreserveUsername

        public void unreserveUsername(String username)
        Unreserves a reserved username. If that username had an associated controller, also deletes that
        Parameters:
        username - the username to be unreserved

      • isUsernameReserved

        public boolean isUsernameReserved(String username)
        Given the username of a player, it returns if that is reserved. An username is reserved if one of the following applies:
        • The player has logged in and is in the lobby
        • The player is in a running match, even if eh is not connected
        Parameters:
        username - username of the player
        Returns:
        whether this player is logged in (playing in a running match or in the lobby)

      • ping

        public void ping()
        Description copied from interface: RemoteServer
        Checks connectivity to the server
        Specified by:
        ping in interface RemoteServer

      • startNewMatch

        public void startNewMatch(Map<String,RemoteView> players)
        Starts a new match with given players
        Parameters:
        players - a map with username as the key and the RemoteView of the player as the value

      • getPlayerMatches

        public ConcurrentMap<String,Controller> getPlayerMatches()
        Returns a map containing, for each player, the controller he's currently playing in
